settings.text: We are a small collective of people inspired by health.

Our new gentle exfoliator is made with biodegradable Florabeads® that help sweep away surface debris and dead skin cells. Combined with Koéna’s scientifically developed Resta-Plex® formula, the ultra-hydrating exfoliant helps remediate clogged pores and reduce breakouts.
settings.text2:
Koéna's Dermaceutical Daily Moisturiser is an intensive daily moisturiser developed by our team of scientists to rehydrate skin prone to dryness, redness, itching, cracking and flaking skin. This long-lasting moisturiser can also help reduce the appearance of wrinkles and prevent breakouts.


Koéna's Australian Clay Mask ﻿is made with Kaolin Australian clay, licorice root and our​ scientifically developed formulation, Resta-Plex, these individual​ ingredients are well researched to help prevent breakouts, tighten​ pores, boost radiance, smooth skin and
settings.text3:

- Koéna Daily Dermaceutical Moisturiser

- Koéna Gentle Cleanser

- All new Koéna Australian Clay Mask

- Special free gift- Face towel made by our friends at Towelling Stories (not available instore or online, while stocks last)

settings.text: FATHER'S DAY SALE - 10% OFF STOREWIDE AUTOMATICALLY APPLIED AT CHECKOUT

Imagine a skincare line that not only works wonders on your skin but also changes the lives of people less fortunate… Enter, Koéna.

At Koéna, we’re passionate about eliminating inflammatory skin disease and improving your quality of life. We’re also passionate about making a difference, which is why 100% of our profits go directly to our incredible not-for-profit partner, Empower.

Giving back to the community is an incredible feeling and we know you’ll get that same blissful feeling every time you purchase a Koéna product.
From our science-backed products, to the social enterprises we support, here's our "Why"
settings.text1: Koéna was developed with a strong vision in mind; to reduce the burden associated with inflammatory diseases and to improve the quality of the lives of those affected...
settings.text2: Resta-Plex® is a unique combination of four key ingredients contained in Koéna Skincare. Resta-Plex® was formulated after years of research and...

settings.text: Our Brands. If you like our products you also can like our partners products

settings.giveback__text: Empower Overseas Aid works in areas of South Asia where hundreds of millions still do not have access to clean water, safe sanitation, healthy hygiene practices, quality education or sustainable livelihoods – yet!

settings.giveback__title: Koéna was established as a social enterprise with a strong vision in mind; to reduce the burden associated with inflammatory diseases and to improve the quality of the lives of those affected. Restoring balance to individuals suffering from inflammatory diseases and giving balance back to communities in need underpins Koéna’s social enterprise initiatives. Koéna proudly allocates 100% of profit from the sale of Koéna products to support the community-impacting initiatives of our not-for-profit partner, Empower Overseas Aid. Learn more about the positive impact your purchase is having on the lives of those in need through our not-for-profit partner Koéna passionately supports.

settings.block__text: Empower Overseas Aid train and equip men and women to be leaders in their communities, sending them out to break the poverty cycle and bring hope and grace. They identify the specific needs of their communities and then work together to build a sustainable future. Severe lack of safe, clean drinking water is an ongoing issue in South Asia. Drought and heavy monsoonal rain result in lack of water or contaminated water storage. Empower is addressing this lack by drilling deep core bore wells in strategic locations.
Empower work in areas of South Asia where hundreds of millions still do not have access to clean water, safe sanitation, healthy hygiene practices, quality education or sustainable livelihoods – yet!

Protecting and promoting health isn’t just providing medical care to the sick. In order to build healthier communities long-term, it’s important to go ‘further up the stream’ to address the external factors contributing to poor health. Two of Empower’s major projects, focus on digging wells and constructing toilets in communities where they work.

Empower are doing some impressive work overseas. They’ve drilled 300 wells which has impacted 552 villages and 50,507 people. To learn more about Empower and the impact they are making, head to their website.

settings.partner__text: Empower Overseas Aid exist to equip, educate & empower through sustainable community transformation.

settings.slide__text: “High caste people in our village did not like my family pumping water from a nearby bore well. One day when my son was fetching water a man hit him on the head with a stick. He started bleeding and had to be hospitalised. We were banned from that well and had to collect water from another well two kilometres away from our house. Now with this new well from Empower, our family and those like us who struggle with the same fate can collect water without restriction. Now I know my son is safe and stays close to home when he collects water. He has time to study now – not like when we had to walk so far several times each day. Thank you for giving us this safe water!” - Meera

"To get water from the nearest hand pump we had to cross a busy railway system. Failing signals led to many deaths but we had no alternative. We had to walk long distances carrying heavy water-laden pots on our heads. I was always afraid to cross the railway lines and then often faced discrimination gathering water. Now our struggle for water is over. This new well is in a safe area - it’s such a relief. We are so grateful to you!” - Pav

“I was so scared we would not have any water. When they started drilling the new well I was concerned there was no water there at all. However, I prayed earnestly until the water began to gush out of the ground! People began jumping and cheering for joy. Now we don’t have to walk for miles for water or fall ill because of drinking contaminated water. Thank you for this noble act!” - Nargis

Agi is an elderly woman living in a remote village with her husband. Her bones are starting to ache, she isn’t as strong as she once was, and every day is a little more challenging for her and her aging husband. The long distance to the nearest water source became too much for them, making it a struggle just to survive. Sickness from impure water was a constant threat to their lives..

settings.button__h: Click 'learn more' to read more about how your Koéna purchase is providing much needed help to those in need

settings.tile__review: Woohoo! It’s going so well. I’m running out of it because it’s part of my morning and night skincare routine and I can’t imagine not using it. I take it on flights with me and put a thick layer on before I board. It’s just such an essential part of my life now…All thumbs up here xoxox

I was battling red, flakey, inflammed skin for months. I'd been down a number of roads with no results, until I was handed Koéna. Within a matter of days, my skin had calmed & I couldn't believe the results.
I have psoriasis and I found this cream to be quickly absorbed into my skin.  It has worked well for me and I would recommend this cream to other psoriasis sufferers.

I was recently working in the garden and disturbed a wasp nest. I was stung on the face and the arm. The pain was pretty bad. My wife applied Koéna cream and within 30 second the pain subsided and I did not have any swelling. I did have to apply it again in around 4 hours but after that it was fine. A neighbour had been stung on the face a few days before by a wasp and was still swollen and sore.

Best soothing and softening cream I have used so far and I have tried many. I had no cracking or bleeding while using it and was able to walk pain free for the first time in ages. The psoriasis patch on the sole of my foot has significantly reduced in size. Great product that I will be recommending it to others.

Before this cream, my skin was as dry as an arid dessert. Nothing would help it, because of this and the eczema, it was severely itchy. After using Koéna, my skin is starting to look like normal skin and the itch is not as bad.

I highly recommend Koéna Dermaceutical Skincare Cream as it provided me with much needed relief from my very dry, itchy skin. I love how it is fragrance free & didn't irritate my skin. Being steroid-free & easily absorbable meant I felt comfortable applying liberally.

settings.video__description: We sat down with Serina to learn about her positive experience using Koéna Skincare Cream. Serina also shares what she loves most about Koéna.
We sat down with Stephen to learn about his positive experience using Koéna Skincare Cream. Stephen also shares what he loves most about Koéna.
The team talk about why they love working for Koéna, while Serina and Stephen share their experience using Koéna Skincare Cream.

settings.tile__description: The Resta-Plex patented formula has two types of glucosamine, which are recognised as a natural anti-inflammatory. They assist in the production of collagen and rebalancing skin inflammation.
settings.tile__sub: Glucosamine is known to help with:
settings.tile__list:
Anti-aging
Skin repairing
Soothing skin conditions such as eczema, psoriasis and dermatitis

settings.tile__description: L-Glycine acts on inflammatory cells, like free radicals, to suppress their role in damaging the cells in your body. It’s also used as an antioxidant and can suppress the inflammatory cytokines when overproduced.
settings.tile__sub: L-Glycine is known to help with:
settings.tile__list:
Wrinkles
UV-B induced skin damage
and photoaging

settings.tile__description: MSM is a naturally produced chemical compound in the body with anti-inflammatory properties that help increase the production of collagen. It is shown to have a role as an anti-aging molecule.
settings.tile__sub: MSM is known to help with:
settings.tile__list:
Acne repair
Skin smoothing
Rosacea
Stretch marks

settings.text:
The pack that'll ensure you take your self care to the next level. Each set includes:

Free face towel made by our friends at Towelling Stories (not available instore, while stocks last

settings.page-text: We have compiled a list of some of our commonly asked questions for you. If you can't find the answer to your question, please email your query through to hello@koena.com.au
settings.faq-title-1: My skin is particularly sensitive, are Koéna products suitable for me?
settings.faq-text-1: Absolutely! When our team of scientists were developing the unique Koéna formulation, one of the non-negotiable requirements was its suitability for people with sensitive skin. But as with any new skincare product, we always recommend conducting a patch test prior to application. If you experience a rash or irritation, please discontinue use.
settings.faq-title-2: What can I use Koéna Cleanser For?
settings.faq-text-2: Koéna's Dermaceutical Gentle Cleanser removes makeup, impurities, oils and dirt, while also cleansing the skin. It's a gentle alternative with ingredients well known to reduce inflammation and redness.
settings.faq-title-3: What is Koéna Dermaceutical Skincare Cream useful for?
settings.faq-text-3: Koéna Dermaceutical Daily Moisturiser can be used across a range of skin applications. Koéna's patented Resta-Plex formulation was formulated to reduce inflammation, making it particularly impactful to skin prone to eczema and psoriasis or susceptible to moisture-loss, cracking or flaking.
settings.faq-title-4: Is Koéna suitable for use on childrens’ skin?
settings.faq-text-4: Absolutely! One of the non-negotiables in developing the Koéna formula was ensuring its suitability for the whole family and for young or sensitive skin. Koéna can be safely used by the whole family (including toddlers) and is safe for people of all ages with eczema, psoriasis and dermatitis prone skin.
settings.faq-title-5: Can I use Koéna on my face?
settings.faq-text-5: Yes! Koéna can be applied to your face, its gentle formula alleviates common issues experienced by people with sensitive skin. Just make sure you take care when in close proximity to your eyes and avoid eye contact. If contact occurs, rinse with water.
settings.faq-text-6:
Since you probably don’t have all day, we’ve summarised the highlights for you:

Our unique Resta-Plex® formulation is patented; a true one of a kind, so you won’t find it anywhere else

When you purchase any Koéna product, 100% of our profits go directly to our amazing not-for-profit partner

It’s backed by years of dedicated scientific research to rehydrate skin prone to dryness, redness, itching and flaking and reduce inflammatory markers that cause skin irritation.
settings.faq-title-7: How often should I apply koéna?
settings.faq-text-7:
We recommend conducting a patch test prior to using Koéna, especially if you are aware that your skin is particularly sensitive, or if you have experienced reactivity issues with other topical gels and creams.


Cleanser - Use morning and night. Apply product into your hands and massage onto wet face and neck. Rinse with lukewarm water. Repeat if necessary.

Mask - Apply an even amount over a clean, dry face. Leave on for 10 minutes or until completely dry and remove with warm water or a face cloth. Use 2-3 times a week or 1-2 times for dry/sensitive skin.

Moisturiser - apply cream liberally to the skin 2 times per day (or you may wish to apply it more frequently for severe cases if required).
settings.faq-title-8: Is it possible to use too much?
settings.faq-text-8: We recommend you follow the usage instructions of each product. See 'How often should i apply Koéna?'
settings.faq-title-9: Are all the ingredients listed on your product packaging?
settings.faq-text-9: Absolutely. You can also see the full list of ingredients on our website within the product here. We're also particularly proud of the things that are "not found" in Koéna - check out our free-from list here.
settings.faq-title-10: Does Koéna contain any animal products?
settings.faq-text-10: Koéna Dermaceutical Daily Moisturiser with Resta-Plex® contains glucosamine derived from crustacea, commonly known as shellfish. It's the shell of the crustaceans and not animal tissue used.
settings.faq-text-11: Right here on our website or through our Facebook and Instagram pages. Koéna is proudly available in pharmacies across Australia. For a full list of pharmacies, please see our stockists page for more info
settings.faq-text-12:
Koéna Dermaceutical Daily Moisturiser is loaded with complex ingredients that have been carefully selected for sensitive skin; therefore, just like your skin, we recommend that absolute love and care be given to your product!

  • Store below 25°C and away from direct sunlight
  • Keep out of reach of children
  • Ensure the cap is secured properly after each use
  • Use within 12 months after opening

Don't:

  • Store in your car or other random places not designed for skincare products that may expose the product to heat
  • Do not use if the tamper-evidence foil seal is missing or if it's past its use-by-date
settings.faq-title-13: Can I use koéna on minor scratches or insect bites/stings?
settings.faq-text-13: Yes, you can. Koéna Dermaceutical Daily Moisturiser can help to reduce the appearance of dryness, redness, cracking, flaking and crusting skin.
settings.faq-text-14: Koéna was developed here in Straya, mate. An innovative team of experts with a passion for skincare spent several years in the lab researching and developing the unique Koéna skincare formulation.
settings.faq-text-15:
Koéna is proudly manufactured right here in in Australia.

Koéna is 100% Australian owned. We are a social enterprise whereby 100% of profits generated from the sale of Koéna products is invested in causes that promote community health and social empowerment. You can learn more about the unique Koéna story here.
settings.faq-text-17: No way, we don't roll like that.
settings.faq-title-18: I’m Pregnant, can I use the Koéna skincare range?
settings.faq-text-18: Congratulations on your pregnancy! Our product range has no concerning ingredients that will harm your baby as our products don’t contain retinols, retinoids, essential oils or salicylic acids. Many mums including our CEO, Rachel, use our skincare range during pregnancy. However, if you are concerned, we recommend consulting your healthcare professional.
